title: LoL Ping Issues FIX THIS SHIT RIOT!!

embed.description: Sorry for the language. This has been my 4th post on LoL forums to fix this shit. I can't rank up due to this ping crazyness. Riot has not even acknowledged this problem. I spend hours trying to rank and can't due to this BS!! On the edge of quiting due to this!

body: I totally realize lag happens every now and then. But this issue has existed since 6.2 or so. This is BS! I'll have 3-4 games that are perfect (0 lag) and then all of the sudden i'll have a bullshit game like the one here. where it throws the game and ruins my LP i had gained. I can't rank for shit. I was almost silver then this shit happened. FIX THIS RIOT!!! WTF! At least acknowledge there is a problem. There are many others here that have posted similar problems.

replies.body:
Let us know if you still have an odd game after this. 

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj

The connection guide is a great resource to common solutions for connection issues. Because patches only modify local files in your League installation, it's extremely unlikely they're impacting your connection. 

If you should still experience issues after working through this guide, I strongly recommend reaching out to our tech specialists by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). You can also greatly help out the specialist by attaching a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to your request.
